articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: DuckDuckGo handles over 102.2 million search requests in one day for a new company record - PhoneArena
articles.description: Privacy focused search engine DuckDuckGo recently set a single day record by handling over 102 million search requests in just one day. Last year the number of searches rose 62% year-over-year.

articles.description: Privacy-focused messenging app Signal has been exploding in popularity, and it’s a surprisingly competent replacement for WhatsApp for those Apple users who have been forced to use the Facebook-owned messaging service for cross-platform communications.
